name: Averyl
description: An optimistic girl who is working hard to become the world's best host.

passiveSkill.name: Victory Announcer
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "When joining the battle, Averyl will appear in the position of a Light, Sorcerer or Summon partner and return the replaced one back to hand, reducing its energy by {placeholder}. This effect can be triggered 1 time per battle."}

uniqueSkill.name: Victory Torch
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Averyl takes out a pompom and does a victory dance, increasing the ATK and Max HP of all allied units on the battlefield and in hand by {placeholder} (up to 2 stacks, each stack not exceeding 200% of Averyl's ATK)."}

specialSkill.name: Victory Cheer
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Averyl spins happily. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK*{placeholder} damage. Increases the ATK of the partner with the highest ATK by {placeholder} (up to 3 stacks).Skill Cast Rate: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.description: Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.
